ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Finally got rid of the old group...
ygData.msgSnippet: I did the digital download and the bonus was a free spirit shroud (a golem).  I ve used it once, but the mechanical mount looks like the war piggies in Plane
ygData.messageBody:
I did the digital download and the bonus was a free spirit shroud (a golem).  I've used it once, but the mechanical mount looks like the war piggies in Plane of Tactics.  They had a big problem with people doing the monser missions.  They were too easy and people were soloing them for AA xp.  They've nerfed them a bit now.  And now it's like watching paint dry.  they don't mvoe very quickly, and I'm wondering if the amount of xp is worth the effort.  Still, some of the drops are really decent.  Frankly, I think Dragons of Norrath was a better expansion pack.  They have overhauled the UI somewhat.  Now you've got 4 hotkey bars: 2 horizontal, and 2 vertical.  You can customize all 4 of them in the Options window.  A lot of people say it looks a lot like EQ2 now, but I dont think so.  It basically looks similar to what it was, just more colors to contrast some of the data.  Yadda Yadda.
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, November 03, 2005 6:37 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Finally got rid of the old group...

The person who created the list quit EQ and left, but he handed it over to me a couple years ago. So I can't take credit for making it. And I have a moderator who handles most of the messages for me. :-) So I can't take much credit for that.
But I am glad that people are joining and hope that they enjoy it here.
To start a topic, has anyone received the new expansion yet? I heard if you buy the box set you get a free mechanical mount.
I also saw that the hotkey bar was changed to look more like the setup in World of Warcraft.
Anyone else noticed this?
luv,
-Su
